diagnoses.label: First-degree and second-degree burns, right arm secondary to hot oil spill
evidence_spans: First-degree and second-degree burns, right arm secondary to hot oil spill.

medications.name: Demerol
evidence_spans: The patient was ordered Demerol 50 mg IM for pain, but he refused and did not want pain medication.

medications.name: Tylenol No. 3
medications.frequency: one or two every four hours p.r.n.
warnings: take one or two every four hours p.r.n.
evidence_spans: Tylenol No. 3, tabs #4, to take home with him and take one or two every four hours p.r.n. for pain.
He is to return tomorrow for a dressing change.

patient_summary: The patient has burns on his arm from hot oil. He needs a dressing change and pain medication. He is going home.
notes: The patient refused Demerol. The ICD-10 codes are candidate codes for clinician review.
